About

Quick life introduction:

  • Born in Oct 1994 in New Delhi, India.
  • Studied upto Grade 3 at Delhi Public School, East of Kailash.
  • Moved to Bangkok, Thailand in April, 2004.
  • Started school at Ekamai International School in August, 2004.
  • Graduated from EIS with Silver Cords in College Preparatory Dimploma - Emphasis in Engineering in May, 2013.
  • Started undergraduate studies at Amity University in Bachelor of Technology - Computer Science & Engineering in July, 2013.
  • Heard Satya Nadella speak at Microsoft Talent India 2014!
  • Interned at OSSCube Solutions from May to July 2015.
  • Interned at Reliance Communications from May to July 2016.
  • Graduated from Amity University with First Class Honors in May, 2017.
  • Moved to Chicago, USA in August 2017.
  • Started graduate school at University of Illinois at Chicago in Master of Science - Computer Science in August, 2017.
  • Won Best Microsoft Hack award at HackHarvard 2017 in October, 2017.
Design by: Prof Alex Smola.
